feed.title: ampls
feed.subtitle: A personal site dedicated to cybersecurity writeups, tutorials, and reports by Garaali Mohamed Amine.

entry.title: TryHackMe | Expose
entry.summary: Reconnaissance For initial reconnaissance, I used this nmap command to scan for open ports: sudo nmap -sS -sV -p- 10.10.188.185 We can see that there is a web server on port 1337. Accessing the site at http://10.10.188.185:1337 shows us a basic HTML page. To enumerate further, I ran ffuf: We find two endpoints: admin and admin_101. SQLi and Database Dump Visiting /admin_101, we see tha...

entry.title: TryHackMe | Cheese CTF
entry.summary: Summary In this room, we leverage an SQL injection exploit to bypass authentication on a login page. Further investigation on the webpage reveals an LFI vulnerability that allows us to achieve RCE via a crafted PHP payload using PHP filters. After obtaining a shell with a system account, we can escalate to user by creating and adding our RSA key to the authorized_keys file of the user comte. T...
